document_title: Overactive bladder: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
Although urinary incontinence is not life-threatening, it greatly affects the patient's quality of life. Specifically, when not treated properly, patients face the following problems:
Frequent infections of the urinary tract and appendages; Feeling self-conscious, insecure, even depressed; Sleep disorders and disrupted sleep cycles; Having many problems related to sex
subsection_title: bang quang tang hoat.json. Complications of overactive bladder
